lead_paragraph: Clady has torn his left anterior cruciate ligament and will probably miss the season, leaving Denver to search for someone to protect quarterback Peyton Manning’s blind side.

headline.print_headline: Broncos’ Pro Bowl Tackle Tears A.C.L.
headline.main: Broncos’ Pro Bowl Tackle Ryan Clady Tears A.C.L.

snippet: Clady has torn his left anterior cruciate ligament and will probably miss the season, leaving Denver to search for someone to protect quarterback Peyton Manning’s blind side.
abstract: Denver Broncos left tackle Ryan Clady will likely sit out season after tearing anterior cruciate ligament.
